title: Typeahead
description: Perform a typeahead search given a Guided Search query.

text.description: A user input string to be passed to the typeahead service.

maxResults.description: The maximum number of typeahead results (if unspecified, the Guided Search configured maximum is used).

searchServicePath.description: The path of the search service to be used (default: 'Default/keywords/typeahead').

searchKey.description: The search key to be supplied to the search service (default: 'keywords').
